java.lang.Object

public class Game
extends Observable

Version:
1.0, 11.10.2011 Represents an the definition of a game.
Author:
Markus Vetsch

Constructor Detail

Game

public Game(Player firstPlayer,
            Player secondPlayer)
Creates an instance of a Game with associated pair of Player.

Parameters:
firstPlayer - - The first Player, i.e. not necessarily the Player defined by getStartPlayer().
secondPlayer - - The first Player, i.e. not necessarily the Player defined by getOtherPlayer().
Method Detail

setObserver

public void setObserver(GameObserver observer)

isStarted

public boolean isStarted()
Returns the information, whether the current Game was already started earlier.

Returns:
true, if the Game was already started; otherwise false.

getBoard

public GameBoard getBoard()
Enables access to the GameBoard

Returns:
The corresponding GameBoard.

getStartPlayer

public Player getStartPlayer()
Returns the Player opening the Game with the first turn.

Returns:
- The Player opening the Game.

getOtherPlayer

public Player getOtherPlayer()
Returns the Player, that is the successor of getStartPlayer().

Returns:
The successor of getStartPlayer().

getPlayerByColor

public Player getPlayerByColor(DropColor color)
Determines the associated Player for the specific DropColor.

Parameters:
color - - The DropColor, which the Player was assigned.
Returns:
The Player using the specified DropColor or null, if DropColor.UNKNOWN was specified.

getStatus

public GameStatus getStatus()
Grants access to the current GameStatus.

Returns:
The current GameStatus.

setStatus

void setStatus(GameStatus status)
Sets the current GameStatus.

Parameters:
status - - The GameStatus to be set.

getStatistic

public GameStatistic getStatistic()
Grants access to the current GameStatistic.

Returns:
The current GameStatistic.

notifyChanged

public void notifyChanged()
Notifies any associated GameObserver about changes within the game model.

notifyChanged

public void notifyChanged(GameBoardSlot slot)
Notifies any associated GameObserver about changes within the game model.

Parameters:
slot - - If not null, this specifies an update of the corresponding GameBoardSlot.

start

public void start()
           throws GameException
Executes all dedicated actions to start the Game.

Throws:
GameException - Thrown, if the Game was already started earlier. The latter can be checked by evaluating the flag isStarted().

stop

public void stop()
          throws GameException
Executes all dedicated actions to stop the Game

Throws:
IllegalStateException - Thrown, if the Game wasn't started yet. The latter can be checked by evaluating the flag isStarted().
GameException

restart

public void restart()
             throws GameException
Restarts the current Game.

Throws:
GameException - Thrown, if the Game was already started earlier or if any unexpected problems on restart of the Game occurred.

save

public void save()
Executes all dedicated actions to save the Game.

load

public void load()
Executes all dedicated actions to restore the Game.
